title: Monitor Port Air Quality
description: An environmental officer needs to check the port's air quality monitoring system for compliance with regulations.

tasks.description: Access the dashboard for the port's real-time air quality monitoring sensors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer logs into the environmental monitoring system.

tasks.description: Review the current levels of pollutants like NOx, SOx, and particulate matter.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer reviews the data from all sensors.

tasks.description: Verify that all readings are within the permitted regulatory limits and log the check.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer confirms all levels are compliant and creates a log entry for the daily check.
